messages.title: Shared Connection
messages.content:
[color=#FF9900]Hi there %username%,

It has come to my attention that you are sharing a connection with at least one other XXX player. Under the [url=https://board.us.ogame.gameforge.com/index.php?thread/51369-ogame-us-game-rules/&postID=503580#post503580]OGame.us Game Rules, Rule 2[/url] states that:

"[i]Each player is allowed to control a single account per universe. If two or more accounts are usually, occasionally, or permanently being played from the same network (e.g. schools, universities, Internet cafes…) [color=#FF0000][b]it is highly recommended to notify a GameOperator in advance[/b][/color] at [url]https://ogame.support.gameforge.com/us[/url].[/i]"

As we have detected that this is the case, I would like to request that all involved accounts contact me via the support system via the above link within the next 72 hours to explain why multiple accounts have been detected on the same network, or [color=#FF0000][b]you may risk a ban on all accounts[/b][/color].

Thank you in advance for your co-operation.

Regards,
%adminname%
[img]https://image.board.gameforge.com/uploads/ogame/us/Other_ogame_us_2020_c5ff26ada345b170145639b3ce318f5f.png[/img][/color]

messages.title: Warning For Insult
messages.content:
[color=#FF9900]Hi there %username%,

It has come to my attention you have been sending messages to other players which have been deemed to be insulting.

[url=https://board.us.ogame.gameforge.com/index.php?thread/51369-%F0%9F%93%9C-ogame-us-game-rules/&postID=445282#post445282]Rule 8 of the OGame.us Game Rules[/url] states that:

"[i]Any kind of insult and spam are not allowed.

- Swearing at a player or using offensive language is not permitted.[/i]"

Please consider this a warning to keep your messages clean in future, as [color=#FF0000]further rule breaks may result in a ban[/color].

If you have any questions regarding this course of action, you may contact me on [url=https://discord.gg/ogame]Discord[/url] or by using the [url=https://ogame.support.gameforge.com/us]support system[/url].

Regards,
%adminname%
[img]https://image.board.gameforge.com/uploads/ogame/us/Other_ogame_us_2020_c5ff26ada345b170145639b3ce318f5f.png[/img][/color]

messages.title: Warning For Non-English Messages
messages.content:
[color=#FF9900]Hi there %username%,

It has come to my attention you have been sending messages to other players in a non-English language.

[url=https://board.us.ogame.gameforge.com/index.php?thread/51369-%F0%9F%93%9C-ogame-us-game-rules/&postID=503567#post503567]Rule 9 of the OGame.us Game Rules[/url] states that:

"[i]The game\’s publisher reserves the right to exclude players, who are not able to speak the game\’s respective native language (e.g. in the game, forum or on the Discord server). Other permitted languages will be listed in the official game forum.

- The only acceptable language in public areas at OGame.us is English. All personal messages, alliance applications, and external alliance content must be written in English. Internal alliance content may be written in non-English, but it must not violate any of the other rules (insults, swearing, etc.).[/i]"

Please consider this a warning to keep your messages in English in future, as [color=#FF0000]further rule breaks may result in a ban[/color].

If you have any questions regarding this course of action, you may contact me on [url=https://discord.gg/ogame]Discord[/url] or by using the [url=https://ogame.support.gameforge.com/us]support system[/url].

Regards,
%adminname%
[img]https://image.board.gameforge.com/uploads/ogame/us/Other_ogame_us_2020_c5ff26ada345b170145639b3ce318f5f.png[/img][/color]

messages.title: Warning For Spam
messages.content:
[color=#FF9900]Hi there %username%,

It has come to my attention you have been sending a high number of espionages to another player which has been deemed to be spam.

[url=https://board.us.ogame.gameforge.com/index.php?thread/51369-%F0%9F%93%9C-ogame-us-game-rules/&postID=445282#post445282]Rule 8 of the OGame.us Game Rules[/url] states that:

"[i]Any kind of insult and spam are not allowed.

- Anything intended to saturate another player's interface is not permitted; this includes, but is not limited to, spamming personal messages, probe spam, overview spam, and advertising other games or other content in-game.[/i]"

Please consider this a warning, as [color=#FF0000]further rule breaks may result in a ban[/color].

If you have any questions regarding this course of action, you may contact me on [url=https://discord.gg/ogame]Discord[/url] or by using the [url=https://ogame.support.gameforge.com/us]support system[/url].

Regards,
%adminname%
[img]https://image.board.gameforge.com/uploads/ogame/us/Other_ogame_us_2020_c5ff26ada345b170145639b3ce318f5f.png[/img][/color]

messages.title: Warning For T&C Breach (Proxy)
messages.content:
[color=#FF9900]Hi there %username%,

It has come to my attention you have been accessing your account via a VPN or proxy.

[url=https://board.us.ogame.gameforge.com/index.php?thread/51369-ogame-us-game-rules/&postID=445292#post445292]Rule 12 of the OGame.us Game Rules[/url] states that:

"[i]The use of a proxy, VPN, or any other method of hiding a player's identity in the game interface is forbidden.[/i]"

In addition, point 3.2.5 of the [url=https://agbserver.gameforge.com/enGB-Terms-2014-OGame.html]GameForge Terms & Conditions[/url] states that:

"[i]It is not permissible to use the GameForge Services via anonymisation services or similar means capable of suppressing or concealing the real IP address or the origin of the user. [/i]"

You are kindly requested to stop accessing this account via a VPN/Proxy connection immediately. Please note that [color=#FF0000]failure to comply with this may result in a ban[/color] at our discretion.

If you have any questions regarding this course of action, you may contact me on [url=https://discord.gg/ogame]Discord[/url] or by using the [url=https://ogame.support.gameforge.com/us]support system[/url].

Regards,
%adminname%
[img]%rank%[/img][/color]
